summary: When the factory in Molkom shuts down, Robin leaves his beloved hometown to try his luck in Stockholm as a wedding photographer. This experience changes not merely his outlook on life but also his hairstyle.
cast: Björn A. Ling|Kjell Bergqvist|Tuva Novotny|Johannes Brost|Lotta Tejle|Tomas Tjerneld|Johanna Strömberg|Johan Östling|Marianne Scheja|Rebecca Scheja|Anastasios Soulis|Michael Nyqvist|Jessica Liedberg|Pontus Olgrim|Erik Lundin|Lubbe Garell|Henrik Svalander|Cecilia Hjalmarsson|Peter Särnblad|Cecilia Wilhelmsson|Karin Wingqvist|Åsa Bengtsson|Jörgen Berthage|Jimmy Lagnefors|Robert Wetterlund|Eliza Sica
keywords: female nudity|topless female nudity|photographer|tattoo|taking a picture
title: Bröllopsfotografen
